title: FEATURE: Daily Briefing Stale Work Queue Detection
context:
**FEATURE REQUEST: Stale Work Queue Alerting**

**Concept:** Daily briefing should automatically surface work queue items that have been sitting too long without progress.

**Technical Requirements:**
- Define "stale" thresholds by priority:
  - P0: 1 day stale = alert
  - P1: 3 days stale = alert  
  - P2: 7 days stale = alert
- Track last_modified timestamps on WQ items
- Include stale items in daily briefing with aging indicators
- Highlight blocked items separately from just old items

**Value Proposition:**
- Prevents important work from falling through cracks
- Proactive project management vs reactive
- Reduces manual queue scanning overhead
- Improves task completion velocity

**Implementation Ideas:**
- Add "days stale" calculation to work_queue_list
- Create stale_items_report function
- Integrate into existing daily briefing workflow
